dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I can’t seem to log in to my account. It keeps saying my password is wrong.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand, Ms. Thompson. Let me help you reset it step by step.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Oh dear, I hope this isn’t too complicated.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Don’t worry, I’ll walk you through everything. Are you on the login page now?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Yes, I think so. There’s a box that says 'Username'.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Great. Please enter your email address there.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright, I did that. Now what?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Click on ‘Forgot Password’ below the password field.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Oh, I see it. Clicking now.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Excellent. You should see a screen asking you to verify your email.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Yes, it says it sent a code to my email. But I don’t know how to open my email.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: No problem. Do you use Gmail, Yahoo, or something else?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Gmail, I believe.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Alright, please open a new tab and type gmail.com.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay, I see my inbox now.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Good. Do you see an email from us with a verification code?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Yes! It says ‘Your verification code’.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Perfect. Please read me the code.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you. Please enter that code on the reset page.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Done. Now it’s asking for a new password.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Please choose a password you’ll remember but is hard for others to guess.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay, I typed one in.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Great. Now click ‘Submit’.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright. It says ‘Password successfully updated’.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Excellent. Now go back to the login page and enter your email and the new password.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Let me try... Oh no, it says ‘Account locked’ now.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: That can happen if there were too many failed attempts earlier. I’ll unlock it for you.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Thank you, dear. I’m so confused by all this technology.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: You’re doing just fine. I’ve unlocked your account. Please try logging in now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay... Oh! I’m in!

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Wonderful! You’re all set.
